text: Raja Mukherjee (17 May 1951 - 18 July 2022) was an Indian cricketer. He played 34 first-class matches for Bengal between 1967 and 1979. His highest score was 154 not out against Orissa. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian cricketers
title: Raja Mukherjee
